channel.title: The Purple Stuff Podcast
channel.description: Jay and Matt talk about toys, junk food, the holidays, movies and retro geek stuff. Sometimes a weird robot joins in.
channel.itunes:summary: Jay and Matt talk about toys, junk food, the holidays, movies and retro geek stuff. Sometimes a weird robot joins in.
channel.itunes:author: Purple Stuff Podcast

item.title: Eight Great Skeletons!
item.itunes:title: Eight Great Skeletons!
item.description: We're celebrating Halloween with a look at eight great SKELETONS from all walks of pop culture! Listen now, or we'll have a bone to pick with you.
